PrivacyPolicy.meta_description: modly.me privacy policy and personal data protection practices.
PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At modly.me, we highly value your privacy. This privacy policy explains how data obtained by our platform through Meta (Instagram Graph API) is collected, used, and protected.
PrivacyPolicy.section1_content:
modly.me can only access the following data with explicit user consent:

Instagram user ID and page ID

Profile and page information (username, profile picture, page name, etc.)

Post content, comments, and likes

Post engagement statistics (number of likes, comments, reach data)

Access tokens obtained during the authorization process

The application does not collect passwords, credit card information, or sensitive personal data.
PrivacyPolicy.section2_content:
The collected data is used solely for the following purposes:

Managing user's social media content and comments

Conducting content planning, analysis, and moderation operations

Generating performance and engagement reports

Improving user experience

Collected data is not shared with third parties, not sold, and is used only to provide the services offered by the application.
PrivacyPolicy.section3_content:
All user data is stored encrypted on secure servers. Access tokens are kept only during active sessions and are automatically revoked when expired.

Users can request deletion of all their data and account information at any time. For requests, contact: privacy@modly.me
PrivacyPolicy.section4_content: modly.me receives data through Instagram Graph API and uses Meta Platforms, Inc. infrastructure in this process. Meta's privacy policy can be reviewed at: https://privacycenter.instagram.com/policy
PrivacyPolicy.section5_content:
Users have the following rights:

Request access to their personal data

Request correction or deletion of their data

Withdraw their consent at any time

For all requests: privacy@modly.me
PrivacyPolicy.section6_content: modly.me may update this policy in accordance with legal regulations or service requirements. All changes take effect as soon as they are published on this page.
